ModMetaData.name: Ground Scanner Redesign
ModMetaData.author: Uuugggg
ModMetaData.description: Redesigns how the Ground-penetrating scanner works. It builds area over time, so you need to keep it on, and the high power usage is actually impactful. It'll remember what was scanned, so you don't need to power it on to see the known resources. It detects surface minerals as well.
